STRATEGY_ZERO_SHOT.title: Zero-Shot Prompting
STRATEGY_ZERO_SHOT.description: Ideal when the model can infer what you want without examples.

STRATEGY_ONE_SHOT.title: One-Shot Prompting
STRATEGY_ONE_SHOT.description: Useful when one clear example helps clarify the format or logic.

STRATEGY_FEW_SHOT.title: Few-Shot Prompting
STRATEGY_FEW_SHOT.description: Use several examples to teach the model patterns or edge cases.

STRATEGY_SYSTEM.title: System Prompting
STRATEGY_SYSTEM.description: Start with a system message to provide context, tone, or task definition.
